title: Is Donald Trump Unwinding the Global Order?

that's helped along by the fact that

private equity etc but the problem

think that became this wow felt

there's fragility in the highly

where business has essentially been

that all you have to do is move things

um what matters is asset prices going up
consumer prices going down now that

this is an imbalance system and the way
that I sort of pull the lens way back is

basically every political economy is
